title: Bug 114905 - Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the default value of the list box in the report parameter to 'aaa'.
2. Modify the default value.

OB (Observed Behavior): 
No default value is set in the list box after modifying it.

EB (Expected Behavior):
The default value should remain as 'aaa' after modifying it.

SR (Steps to Reproduce):
1. Add a list box as a report parameter and set its default value to 'aaa'.
2. Modify the default value to a different value.
3. Check the value of the list box, it should still be 'aaa'.
4. Click the OK button.
5. The OK button should be grayed out.

Actual result:
No default value is set in the list box after modifying it.
After step 5, the OK button is still enabled.
